content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the character’s understanding and pursuit of justice contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the character’s understanding and pursuit of justice contribute to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
